title: Dante Alighieri - Inferno - 2 - Claudio Carini

   Five hours and one minute in Dante's Hell as related by Claudio Carini (mp3s @96 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the sound is excellent).

   At the end of Canto XXXIV you have descended to the very core of the earth.. If you wish to ascend to Purgatory and Paradise go to:- http://www.recitarleggendo.com/download.htm , where you can download mp3s of the complete Commedia.
